div.head: Test for app attached by double endpoint attachment method
div.p: etena yad uktaṃ kaṇikāyāṃ yadi kulālādīnāṃ katipayopakaraṇādijñānam, na samastopakaraṇādijñatā, tarhi tenaiva nidarśanena īśvarasyāpi tadupakaraṇādimātrajñānam | tanmātrajñāne na sarvajñatāsiddhiḥ | katipayajño hi tathā sati syāt |
